params.durationDays: The duration of the group in days
params.name: The name of the group

returns._0: The total number of groups created

params.groupId: The ID of the group to join

contribute(uint256).notice: Make a contribution to a group

getGroupMember(uint256,address).notice: Get member information for a specific group

verifyUser(address).notice: Verify a user (simplified version - will be replaced with Self Protocol)

withdrawFromGroup(uint256).notice: Withdraw funds from a completed group (only for members)
